body: The minimum CMake version has been updated to 3.21 in LBANN (https://github.com/LLNL/lbann/pull/2027), Hydrogen (https://github.com/LLNL/Elemental/pull/132), and Aluminum (https://github.com/LLNL/Aluminum/pull/142) in order to take advantage of its improved support for the CUDA SDK. Pinging @benson31 and @bvanessen.
title: Update CMake to 3.21 in LBANN-related projects
